price: Nesse dia, para cada um destes, haverá uma situação que o preocupará.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
